channel.title: first file on Minimal
channel.description: Recent content in first file on Minimal

item.title: myFirstFile
item.description: What’s next ? So, this is my first file on my own Hugo webpage, the date is 25th, March 2020. Now is late in the night.I don’t know how far will I go with this, the initial motivation for me to create a webpage is to create a similar (probably the same…) webpage for a girl I care about… Anyway, that’s it. And I do wish to share some of my opinions with you boys and girls, maybe some new codes?
